review: Sad to say that this product did not meet any of my expectations.  The device was slow to load on my LG SmartTV, and the Wifi was working perfect on every other device I owned connected to Wifi, but this device did not want to connect to my network.  Loading apps and general use of the device seems very slow.  I expected more from this device but this was a complete bust unfortunately.  In my opinion if a device has problems simply connecting to a network that is working 100%, then deeper internal issues are to be expected of this device unfortunately.  I certainly hope that Amazon works out the kinks someday or simply goes back to the drawing board, this is almost bad as HP.  I absolutely love the Amazon Echo, but I am certainly not feeling that sufficient time and effort was put into making the firestick, I imagine it was rushed in order to compete with other similar products in the market unfortunately.I would certainly purchase something like this again from Amazon if they get it right.....*I returned this product promptly back to Amazon...., upon realizing all their troubleshooting advice was useless
